ygData.subject: SV: [EverQuest] Lag in zones
ygData.msgSnippet: Geforce3 Ti200 GeForce2 GTS/Ultra 64Mb GeForce2 32 Mb Mobile (laptop) Only got 256Mb Rdram tho, but i ve not noticed any lag but havn t played alot either. ...
ygData.messageBody:
Geforce3 Ti200
GeForce2 GTS/Ultra 64Mb
GeForce2 32 Mb Mobile (laptop)

Only got 256Mb Rdram tho, but i've not noticed any lag but havn't played
alot either.


-----Ursprungligt meddelande-----
Från: mlockridge01 [mailto:MLockridge01@...]
Skickat: den 7 januari 2002 18:21
Till: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
Ämne: [EverQuest] Lag in zones


I just added the necessary memory to max out my system.
Unfortunately, that max is 256. I would love to go to 512 or more,
but that would require a new system.

Things have improved with the added memory, but I still get lots of
lag in Rivervale, and similar town type zones. My graphics card is an
Nvidia TNT 64 (don't know what the 64 means, it is 32meg). It is the
best I could find last year for the money I had, and more than
adequate for the game at that time. I needed pci, so my choices were
a bit limited. More than that, my knowledge was much less in those
days.

I am curious as to what kinds of graphics cards people use, and
whether or not they are experiencing lag in zones like Rivervale in
spite of having a pretty good system.

Anyone have a killer rig, and still find lag or other problems? I
just wonder how much is the game, how much my now low end system.

Barto Proudfoot
